trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 3 other sightings in New York on or around January 25th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsOK I WENT OUT FOR SMOKE WALKING UP MY DRIVEWAY AS DOING SO I HEARD A RUNBLE FROM THE SKY THOUGHT IT MAY BE A PLAIN.WHEN I LOOKED UP I SAW A CRAFT WITH MULTI COLOR FLYING PRETTY FAST.THE HAIRS ON MY BACK STOOD UP BECAUSE THE CRAFT WAS GOING STREIGHT THEN WITH A SUDDEN CHANGE FLEW OVER MY HOUSE.WHEN THE FRIST CRAFT FLEW AWAY SOMETHIG WAS STILL MOVING BLACK IN COLOR BOTH WHERE TRIANGLE WHILE CHANGING FROM RED ORANGE GREEN WHEN LEAVE THEY BOTH WENT BLUE LIKE A SKY BLUE.AS I STOOD THERE AFTER THE FRIST CRAFT DISAPPEARED THE SECOND ONE LIKE IT WAS MOVING ALITTLE SLOWER LIKE IF IT WAS RECORDING THE AREA.I TRULY DID NOT WANT TO WRITE THIS RIGHT NOW CAUSE I DON'T WANT NO ON TO THINK I AM CRAZY BUT SSERIOUSLY WHATEVER I SAW WAS NOT A STEALH BOMBER IT WAS MORE LIKE A SHADDOW WITH LIGHTS.I THOUGHT I HAD COMMON ISSUES LIKE ANY PERSON.BUT NOW I FEEL STRANGE LIKE A PERSON SEEING A GHOST.I WAS NOT CLOSED MINDED TO THE WORD OF UFO BUT THAT WORD WAS NEVER IN MY DAILY BREATH.TODAY AGAIN I FEEL SO WERID AT THE FACT TWO BLACK CRAFTS FLY PASS ME CHANGING DIRECTION CHANGING COLOR AND I NEVER EVER I MEAN EVER SEEN WHAT I SAW THAT NIGHT. PLEASE TAKE ME SERIOUS BUT I WONT REPEAT THIS TO NO ONE ELSE.I WONT HAVE PEOPLE THINK I'M NUTS. BUT NOW I KNOW THE STRANGE AND STRANGE WITH GREAT SPEED AND BRIGHT COLORS BLACK TRIANGLE SHAPE AND WITH FLIGHT MOVES I NEVER SEEN A PLAIN TAKE.. SOME ONE PLEASE TELL ME WHAT I SAW..THANK YOU AND NOW I FEEL WORRIED..
Summary: PLEASE TAKE THIS SERIOUS ,WENT OUT FOR SMOKE HEAR A SOUND IN THE AIR SOUNDED LIKE A PLAIN LOOKED UP AND SOMETHING CHANGE FROM RED TO ORANGE FLEW FAST AS IT LEFT IT WENT BLUE I GOT SCARED THEN SAW A SECOND CRAFT WITH A BLACK TRIANGLE SHAPE
